HTML.question: Which HTML tag is used for creating a table?
What does the HTML acronym CSS stand for?
Which tag is used for creating an unordered list?
In HTML, which attribute is used to provide additional information about an element?
What is the purpose of the HTML <form> element?
options: c) Define a form for user input
HTML.correct_answer: c) Define a form for user input

HTML.question: Which HTML tag is used for creating a hyperlink that links to an email address?
What is the purpose of the HTML <head> element?
options: b) Contain meta-information about the document
HTML.correct_answer: b) Contain meta-information about the document

What does the HTML <hr> tag represent?
Which tag is used to define a line break in HTML?

CSS.question: Which property is used to change the text color in CSS?
Which CSS property is used for controlling the space between elements?
What is the purpose of the CSS property 'float'?
options: b) Align text to the center
c) Float an element to the left or right
CSS.correct_answer: c) Float an element to the left or right

CSS.question: In CSS, how do you select an element with the class name 'example'?
What is the purpose of the 'z-index' property in CSS?
options: b) Control the order of stacked elements
CSS.correct_answer: b) Control the order of stacked elements

CSS.question: Which CSS property is used for changing the font of an element?
How can you center an element horizontally in CSS?
Which CSS property is used for adding shadows to text?

JavaScript.question: What does the acronym DOM stand for in JavaScript?
How do you declare a variable in JavaScript?
What is the purpose of the JavaScript function 'parseInt()'?
options: a) Parse a string as an integer
b) Parse a string as a float
c) Parse a string as a boolean
d) Parse a string as a date
JavaScript.correct_answer: a) Parse a string as an integer

JavaScript.question: What does the '=== operator' do in JavaScript?
Which event is triggered when a user clicks on an HTML element in JavaScript?
What is the purpose of the 'typeof' operator in JavaScript?
options: a) Check the type of a variable
JavaScript.correct_answer: a) Check the type of a variable

JavaScript.question: How do you write a comment in JavaScript?
Which built-in method is used to join elements of an array into a string in JavaScript?
What is the purpose of the 'setTimeout' function in JavaScript?
options: a) Pause the execution of code
b) Set an interval for code execution
c) Execute code after a delay
JavaScript.correct_answer: c) Execute code after a delay

JavaScript.question: In JavaScript, what does the term 'closure' refer to?
options: a) A way to close a webpage
b) A function with access to its own scope
JavaScript.correct_answer: b) A function with access to its own scope
